title: Mizuho Adds HSBC, JPMorgan, Deutsche Bank Hires in Wave
description: Mizuho Financial Group Inc. has brought in Jon Connor, Thibaud de Maria and Richard Robinson as part of a hiring wave of senior investment bankers, said people familiar with the matter who asked not to be identified because it wasn’t public yet.
